column1: Uchi////I recently went to a Uchi on a Friday evening at 6:30 pm with my girlfriend.  They have valet parking behind the restaurant
column2: but we were lucky and found free street parking nearby.  We don't typically go to Uchi because there's always a long wait
column4: there was an hour wait when we arrived.  We didn't have any reservations unfortunately.  Luckily
column5: there was open seating near the bar right away
column6: and they actually serve their entire food menu there.  We opted for this option.
